About me

Hi, I am Keyan Pishdadian, a programmer currently living in Brooklyn NY where I am working on fun open source projects at Hacker School. Before I started playing with computers I played with bacteria. Thankfully it's much easier to tell computers what to do.

Aside from programming I like rock climbing, watching movies, biking, and thinking about warmer weather.

Contact me

Find me on Github / Twitter or get in touch with me at kpishdadian@gmail.com whether you want to discuss the meaning of life or just say Hello.
